<title level="1" right="Trait">[Kobold](/Traits.aspx?ID=759)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 317 <sup>1.1</sup>

A creature with this trait is a member of the [kobold](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=80) ancestry, reptilian humanoids who are usually Small and typically have [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=2410). An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by kobolds.
name: Kobold
